channel.title: Ultimate Miner v.B.055 - by RealRune
channel.description:
Here it is for anyone of you who want it. Mining + Banking in ve and vw, aswell as powermining. VE Mining + Banking Works Nearly Flawless.
PLEASE POST PROGRESS REPORTS!!!

Reset the colors that are in the top, they’re pretty old. Hmm… by lost it means that it hasn’t mined for 5 mins. or more, it’s a kind of precaution so that you don’t end up stuck in the frog cave for 5 hrs.

Mined & Dropped 46 Rock[s].
Mined & Banked 0 Rock[s].
Banked 0 Time[s].
Worked for 32 Minutes and 37 Seconds
<=================Player Reports=================>
0 : 2hallo2 = True. Mined 46 Rock[s]. Mining Lvl = 32 Location = Lost;
<================================================>

But it was right next to the rock…

item.title: Ultimate Miner v.B.055 - by RealRune
item.dc:creator: @realrune realrune
item.description:
@realrune wrote:

This is a lil’ old, which is why the closebank is off. The bankopening uses openbankquiet, which makes it take so long. It’s a lot better then any other openbank procedure, because those are hugely detectable.

Here’s the fix for closebank, which will be in the next version of srl. Replace the bankclosing i have in there with this and it will close it without multiple clicks.

procedure CloseBank;
begin
  if not Bankscreen then exit;
  if (FindColor(x, y, 65536, 340, 1, 500, 50)) then
  begin
    MMouse(X + 5 + Random(11), Y + 5 + Random(11), 0, 0);
    Wait(20 + Random(20));
    GetMousePos(x, y);
    Mouse(x, y, 0, 0, true);
  end;
end;

I’m glad you all like it. I’ll try and update it once my next script is complete.

Read full topic

item.title: Ultimate Miner v.B.055 - by RealRune
item.dc:creator: @WhiteShadow WhiteShadow
item.description:
@WhiteShadow wrote:

[scar]<=================Progress Report================>
Mined & Dropped 0 Rock[s].
Mined & Banked 56 Rock[s].
Banked 2 Time[s].
Worked for 15 Minutes and 2 Seconds
<=================Player Reports=================>
0 : Surferz = True. Mined 56 Rock[s]. Mining Lvl = 62 Location = VE Bank;
<================================================>[/scar]

Comments
-Handled Gas
-Autocolored the road color? I admire you man!
-1337 mapwalking
-Nice how it right clicks at times
-Good script for VE iron.

Just the banking is the bit of the problem. Less movements yes, but it takes really long. It doesn’t always CloseBank right; so make a repeat loop with a failsafe timer so it closes bank for sure. Instead of LoadsCompleted < Loads try something like : if(Players[CurrentPlayer].Banked mod Loads <> 0)then

Excellent script. I was in the process of making one but it’s really bad and everything. So thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Ultimate Miner v.B.055 - by RealRune
item.dc:creator: @tarajunky tarajunky
item.description:
@tarajunky wrote:

Hmm, I tried mining at VE, and it had some problems. The first few times it would walk past the mine and get lost. So then I changed it to powermining in the VE mine, which worked okay. But it would often click a rock, wait like 2 seconds, then go click another rock before the first was mined. I tried this 5 or 6 times with okay results. Then I took one of my guys over to the VW bank to mine on that side. The walking got screwed up a little bit again. It reached the mine okay a few times, and was going around mining iron and silver. I ran it probably 3 times over there. This was all over the course of a couple of days.

Today when I tried to log in, the account was banned. I think it went from lvl 3 mining to level 20, and that was it. I think it banked 2 loads total, and probably mined and dropped 5 or 6 total before that. It solves lost pickheads well and seems to detect gas pretty good too.

Read full topic

AWESOME script. :)[/quote]
Mining silver doesn’t work too well, the colors of the ridge the ores are in clashes with the silver color too much. I suggest iron and clay for vw mining, and sometimes tin works ok.
